title: 在MC里面你做过最傻的东西是.什么？
author: Chikerenaham
txt_content:
在第一次MC里面你做过最傻的东西是什么？


我的是以为怪兽不可以死的，要看影片才知到怎样可以弄一个 Crafting Table，和不知道如何矿工。

replies.author: 星E君
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 天迹灬战狂神 于 2014-11-9 18:51 编辑 

hey there, one thing I want to fix is that: 

"mine" right here is a verb, but what you used is "矿工". 

"矿工"means miner, this is a noun....

verb mine in Chinese is "挖矿"




chinese is not your first langurage...am i right?
